full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Flood Hazard Data
### Solicitation Information

| Category | Information |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS4160360643-Doc4380935542 |
| **Amendment Number** | 11 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4160360643 |
| **Publication Date** | 2024-01-04 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2024-02-29T14:00:00 |

### Tender Details

* **Project Title (English)**: Ongoing Flood Hazard Data
* **Project Title (French)**: Données sur les risques d’inondation
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFQ)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Contracting Party**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Full Name: Robert Picco2
	+ Email: robert.picco2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Contract Information

* **Expected Start Date**: None
* **Expected Completion Date**: 2025-03-03
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Cost-per-Point
* **Procurement Category**: Government of Canada (GD)
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18425883?extsite=MTg0MjU4ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Description

Public Safety Canada requires the delivery of Canada-wide flood hazard data originating from a Canada-wide flood hazard model. The model must be able to geographically depict flood extents and depths for various return periods and flood-generating mechanisms, as well as predict the effects of climate change scenarios. The contractor submitting the lowest cost-per-point bid will be selected for the project. 

Note: All relevant information is included yet because the tender has expired, it will not be possible to bid on this project. The rewritten tender will be available to provide details to you for other projects.  Please let me know if you need the pronuncation for French terms as this can be helpful for understanding. The previous extracted fields were somewhat important for your verification purposes but do mostly explain the rest of the entry. 
This is the section here, but since the tender is expired information is not useful for bidding
